Tutorials
=========

The following tutorials explain how to:

* Run XID+ on SPIRE maps
* Carry out analysis on output

Both are taken from Jupyter notebooks available in the `package directory <https://github.com/H-E-L-P/XID_plus/tree/master/docs/notebooks/examples/>`_

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   ./notebooks/examples/XID+example_run_script.ipynb
   ./notebooks/examples/XID+posterior_analysis_validation.ipynb
